邟邟邟

邟字的基本解释

邟
kàng
〔邟乡〕中国汉代地名，在今河南省汝州市。

邟
háng
〔餘邟〕古地名，即今中国浙江省余杭县。

邟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàng］
［《廣韻》苦浪切，去宕，溪。］
古地名。亦称邟乡。在今河南省汝州市。

邟字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　邟； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1268第20
【唐韻】苦浪切【集韻】口浪切，?音抗。【說文】潁川縣名。　又【玉篇】古衡切【集韻】居行切，?音耕。義同。　又【廣韻】胡郞切【集韻】寒剛切，?音杭。【廣韻】餘邟，縣名。在吳興，今作杭。　又【廣韻】苦岡切【集韻】丘岡切，?音康。【集韻】城名，在陽翟。

邟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
邟字的起名意思

暂无。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
kàng
[Yixiang] Place names in the Han Dynasty in China, in Ruzhou City, Henan Province.
Yun
háng
〔余邟〕Ancient place name is now Yuhang County, Zhejiang Province, China.
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kàng］
["Guangyun" bitter waves cut, go to Dang, Xi. ]
Ancient place names. Also known as Yunxiang. In today's Ruzhou City, Henan Province.
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　邟; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1268 No. 20
[Tang Yun] bitter waves cut [Jiyun] mouth waves cut, sound resistance. 【Said the text】The name of Yingchuan County.　[Jade articles] Gu Hengqi [Jiyun] in line cutting,? Sound farming. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Hu Yun cut [Ji Yun] Han Gang cut,? Yinhang. [Guangyun] Yu Yun, the name of the county. In Wuxing, today is Hang.　 [Guang Yun] Kugang cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Gang cut,? Yinkang. 【Jiyun】The name of the city is in Yangdi.
Yun
